Class RTOCaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • mcgui.Multicaster
      • RTOCaster

  • public class RTOCaster
extends mcgui.Multicaster
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Asier Rivera Fernandez

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static int Crashed
      Value that indicates a crashed state.
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<TextMessage> delivered
      Holds up buffer for delivered messages.
      (package private) int localNumber
      Saves the local order number, in order to know next message to be delivered.
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<OrderMessage> orderMessages
      Hold up buffer for received OrderMessages.
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<TextMessage> received
      Holds up buffer for received but not delivered messages.
      (package private) static int Running
      Value that indicates a running state.
      (package private) int sequencerID
      Saves the ID number of the node that is the sequencer.
      (package private) int sequencerNumber
      Saves the sequencer number, the sequencer uses it to set a order number to next message to be delivered.
      (package private) int[] stateNode
      Saves whether the node is running or crashed.
      (package private) java.lang.String uniqueIDchar
      Saves local unique character for the "casted" messages, joined with the 'uniqueIDnumber' creates unique IDs for messages.
      (package private) int uniqueIDnumber
      Saves local order number for the "casted" messages, joined with the 'uniqueIDchar' creates unique IDs for messages.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void basicpeerdown(int peer)
      Signals that a peer is down and has been down for a while to allow for messages taking different paths from this peer to arrive.

      Checks whether the given message can be delivered or not, looking if its TextMessage has arrived and if it is its turn.

      Checks whether the given message can be delivered or not, looking if its OrderMessage has arrived and if it is its turn.
      void cast(java.lang.String messagetext)
      The GUI calls this module to multicast a message.
      private void checkMessagesToOrder()
      Checks for those messages that arrived while the Sequencer was crashed so they will never have a order and they won't be delivered.
      private void checkQueue()
      Checks whether there is more related TextMessage and OrderMessage that can be delivered.

      Initializes the variables needed for the execution.

        java.lang.String uniqueIDchar
        Saves local unique character for the "casted" messages, joined with the 'uniqueIDnumber' creates unique IDs for messages.

        int uniqueIDnumber
        Saves local order number for the "casted" messages, joined with the 'uniqueIDchar' creates unique IDs for messages.

      • sequencerID

        int sequencerID
        Saves the ID number of the node that is the sequencer.

      • sequencerNumber

        int sequencerNumber
        Saves the sequencer number, the sequencer uses it to set a order number to next message to be delivered.

        Saves the local order number, in order to know next message to be delivered.

        private boolean canBeDelivered(TextMessage msg)
        Checks whether the given message can be delivered or not, looking if its OrderMessage has arrived and if it is its turn.

        Returns:
        True if the given message can be delivered or False if it can't.

        private void checkQueue()

      • checkMessagesToOrder

        private void checkMessagesToOrder()
        Checks for those messages that arrived while the Sequencer was crashed so they will never have a order and they won't be delivered.
